name: Star Revenge 1: Star Takeover
description:
Star Revenge 1: Star Takeover (formerly Star Revenge 1) is a ROM Hack made by BroDute and first released with 100 stars on September 3rd, 2012. A major update of this hack was released on August 25th, 2018 which added the "Star Takeover" episode title and raised the star count to 101.

A substantial remake of Star Revenge 1, Star Revenge Redone, was released on February 10th, 2013. Star Revenge Redone was then the basis for Star Revenge 1.5: Star Takeover Redone, first released as Star Revenge Redone 2.0 on August 14th, 2015.
